statements: SELECT * FROM billing_info WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, service_name FROM billing_info WHERE data_usage > 100;
SELECT * FROM billing_info ORDER BY billing_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(data_usage) AS average_data_usage FROM billing_info;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_entries FROM billing_info GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, service_name, data_usage, billing_date FROM billing_info WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM billing_info WHERE data_usage > 1000 ORDER BY billing_date DESC;
SELECT service_name, data_usage FROM billing_info WHERE billing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY data_usage DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT service_name, COUNT(*) AS num_customers FROM billing_info GROUP BY service_name HAVING num_customers > 1;
SELECT AVG(data_usage) AS avg_data_usage, MIN(data_usage) AS min_data_usage, MAX(data_usage) AS max_data_usage FROM billing_info;
SELECT * FROM BillingInfo WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT billing_id, customer_id, billing_date FROM BillingInfo WHERE service_type = 'Internet';
SELECT * FROM DataTracking WHERE device_id = 201 ORDER BY tracking_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM BillingInfo WHERE billing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(data_usage) AS total_usage FROM DataTracking GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM BillingInfo;
SELECT customer_id, service_type, billing_date FROM BillingInfo ORDER BY billing_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, service_type, amount FROM BillingInfo WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT service_type FROM BillingInfo;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount_paid FROM BillingInfo GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM billing_information;
SELECT billing_id, billing_date, billing_amount FROM billing_information;
SELECT user_id, service_type, billing_date FROM billing_information WHERE billing_amount > 100;
SELECT user_name, phone_number, email, address FROM user_information;
SELECT * FROM data_usage WHERE data_usage_mb BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
SELECT * FROM billing_information WHERE billing_amount > 1000 ORDER BY billing_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, phone_number, email FROM user_information WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_name, service_type FROM user_information JOIN billing_information ON user_information.user_id = billing_information.user_id;
SELECT SUM(billing_amount) AS total_billing FROM billing_information WHERE billing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_name, data_usage_mb, usage_date FROM user_information JOIN data_usage ON user_information.user_id = data_usage.user_id ORDER BY usage_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM billing_info;
SELECT billing_id, customer_id, amount FROM billing_info WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT service_name, price FROM service_info ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customer_info WHERE contact_email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT customer_id, service_id, usage_date FROM usage_tracking WHERE usage_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, contact_email FROM customer_info LIMIT 10;
SELECT service_name, service_type, price FROM service_info ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customer_info WHERE contact_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT billing_id, customer_id, amount FROM billing_info WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT tracking_id, customer_id, service_id, usage_date, usage_time FROM usage_tracking WHERE bytes_transferred < 1000;
SELECT * FROM billing_accounts;
SELECT account_holder_name, billing_address FROM billing_accounts WHERE account_id = '7c758d46-1cfc-4f11-a92d-45c02a5d61f2';
SELECT device_name, device_type, activation_date FROM devices ORDER BY activation_date DESC;
SELECT plan_name, monthly_price FROM service_plans WHERE data_limit > 1000 ORDER BY monthly_price ASC;
SELECT billing_date, total_amount_paid FROM billing_history WHERE total_amount_paid >= 50.00 ORDER BY billing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_accounts;
SELECT account_holder_name, billing_address FROM billing_accounts WHERE billing_cycle_start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY billing_cycle_start_date DESC;

SELECT account_holder_name, billing_address, billing_cycle_start_date FROM billing_accounts WHERE account_holder_name LIKE '%Smith%' AND billing_cycle_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY billing_cycle_start_date ASC;
SELECT plan_name, monthly_price FROM service_plans WHERE monthly_price > 50 ORDER BY monthly_price DESC;

SELECT device_name, device_type, activation_date, plan_name FROM devices INNER JOIN service_plans ON devices.service_plan_id = service_plans.plan_id WHERE device_type = 'Smartphone' ORDER BY activation_date DESC;
